about_the_game:
World At War 85 Digital is a dynamic platoon-level combat computer game based on the award-winning board games of the same series name. World At War 85 Digital is fast and furious platoon-level combat set in 1985. In an alternate history of World War III, when the Warsaw Pact armies storm across the border of East Germany in a powerful attempt to seize West Germany and the whole of Free Europe.



World At War 85 Digital system features a unique combat system that involves both attacking units and defending units, which keeps both players engaged throughout the game. Initiative, formation activation, random turn length, close air support, and air cover are all integrated smoothly. You command and control your forces including air support and you will fight in desperate close assaults. World At War 85 Digital series has you covered with a variety of battles and theaters on every front.



Our game manual and module booklets can be viewed online and downloaded and our tutorial videos viewed on our Online Library site. Our game manual comes in a variety of PDF format for free. Our manuals have lots of examples to illustrate the game mechanics. Our motto is “Play the Game, Not the Rules”. We understand that the best way to learn a game system is to be shown. We achieve this with our extensive play-list of “boot camp” training videos, available on YouTube, that walk you through the entire system rule by rule.



We plan on having many DLC available and our DLC Battle Generator with Scenario Edition puts the power into the player's hand to make any type of scenario or campaign possible. It’s platoon-level tactical combat at its best!
